articles.title: EU medicines agency approves Moderna's booster shot for people aged 18 and above| World English News - WION
articles.description: The European Union medicines agency has approved Moderna's COVID-19 booster vaccine for people aged 18 and above. It is the second booster vaccine to be appr...

articles.author: Ivan
articles.title: Sony Xperia PRO-I brings 1.0-inch sensor and variable f/2.0-4.0 aperture - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Sony's extravagant "Pro" phone will arrive in early December in select markets in Europe.
articles.content:
Update: Check out our Sony Xperia Pro-I handson review.
Out of the blue, Sony has a new Xperia Pro phone. The Xperia Pro-I (where 'I' stands for 'Imaging') is the first phone outside Japan to delive… [+3063 chars]

articles.author: Adrian Padeanu
articles.title: Mazda CX-3 Production For Europe Ending In December - Motor1
articles.description: Mazda Poland's PR has announced production of the CX-3 for Europe will come to an end in December. The small crossover has already been discontinued in the US.
articles.content: [UPDATE] Mazda Germany has confirmed in a phone call with Motor1.com that production of the CX-3 for the European market will be terminated at the end of the year. It will continue for other markets.… [+1960 chars]
